name: Street Skateboarding - Play Free 8-bit Retro Pixel Skating Games
name_original: Street Skateboarding - Play Free 8-bit Retro Pixel Skating Games
description:
Prepare for the ultimate street skateboarding challenge. If you love skateboarding, you will love this game. Try to get the highest possible score you can and compete with others in Game Center. Share your score on Facebook and Twitter.

* 8-bit art style and retro look
* Play with just one tap
* Very fast and challenging game play
* Easy to play, but hard to master
* Game Center integrated for more fun
* FREE... everything is there at no price

Try it now. This cute indie game is awesome!
